review:
We have visited Dr Shravanti recently  and after a lot of research for my sons complex dental issue  .She explained us the dental procedure for my son very  well and can undoubtedly say the  treatment was done par excellence although it was a bt complicated and my son was non cooperative . ************* *** **  *** ** *** **** ********  ** *** ****  ******* * ***** ***  I was surprised to hear that she even worked in US and had great experience dealing with patients .I Hugely applaud  her energy  and patience who specially looks after each and  every patient   with utmost care and   does with  the best efforts and not hurriedly 

Below are some of the reasons why to choose Doctor Sravanthi 

1. The best ,friendly  and experienced  Dentist who is  always available for her patients 
2  Never have  seen a better humanly dentist, highly recommended trait
3.Frequent followups  to ensure patient is doing okay post treatment   ( I bet no one will do this)
4. Does it with so ease in a professional,friendly manner, explaining all points clearly. She  makes complex surgeries in a simple and painless way.

I went for a teeth cleanup, and the best thing was throughout my cleanup, there was no damage to my gums and no sign of blood. I have had horror experiences in the past with other dentists. This was the best cleanup I had ever had by far. Thank you  Dr. Sravanthi

Dr. Sravanthi made me trust Dentists again. She was extremely professional with examining and providing with solutions, yet friendly to talk to and someone you can count on. I had a root canal done where Dr. Sravanthi did a wonderful job making me feel like I was in good hands - it did not pain at all. I was extremely impressed with the service and highly recommend her for any dental need. Dr. Sravanthi is incredibly skilled and I would certainly tell my family and friends to visit her.

I was having immense pain suddenly on one of my teeth and I reached out to Dr Sravanthi for consultation. She made me very comfortable and after checkup she advised to have root canal surgery immediately as tooth nerve has been infected. The pain persisted for a couple of days more but thankfully the gel recommended by Dr Sravanthi worked wonders.

************ ** *** ** *** **** *********** ** *******. She has given good suggestions and explained the right treatment for my kid 8 years old, who used to be very fussy but instead she was very happy and got her treatment done with dr.S
Thank you Doc and Partha dental

Just one line, **** ** *** *****

My father is a 69 year old man, having tooth issues from a while. I was New to the city, came to know about her and after I visited, it was all taken care by here. Best treatment and care one  could have asked for.
Good and friendly dr ..very well experienced ..thanx mam for the treatment given to my kid  as he is very scared of dental treatment

This clinic has helped me overcome my apprehension about dental treatment. With highly skilled and empathetic professionals and the best protective measures for infection control, I am a happy and satisfied patient. Thank you Dr.Sravanthi

Dr. Sravanthi is highly experienced and friendly. My mother went for the root canal, and she is really satisfied. I would definitely recommend Dr Sravanthi for any dental service. The latest technology is used.

Dr.Sravanthi has done excellent root canal and treated me very well in one single sitting .
She treated me very well 
Thank you to Dr. Sravanthi
